prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that has a sleek, elongated body and shimmering scales.
I want a mystical creature with vibrant colors and sharp, piercing eyes that exude power.
Generate a legendary Pokemon with a majestic wingspan, combining deep purple and fiery red hues.
Make an imposing Pokemon that embodies darkness and chaos with unique, swirling patterns on its body.
Imagine a powerful creature that can manipulate time and space, with a design inspired by ancient myths.
Design a Pokemon with a serpentine form that features ethereal energy flowing from its body.
Give me a Pokemon that has both dragon and ghost elements, with a haunting yet beautiful appearance.
